name: scribbly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
written or drawn quickly or carelessly: The notebook was filled with scribbly, often indecipherable, pencil sketches. My handwriting can get pretty scribbly if I write too fast. See also
scribbly gum
More examplesFewer examplesI have to admit, my handwriting is a little scribbly.The picture book is delightfully bizarre and abstract, with cute scribbly animal characters zooming around in adventures in the sky.Are you one of those people who can turn scribbly lines into pictures?From these initial scribbly drawings she produces beautiful works of art.
